summary: This is a JPMorgan Chase Bank Asset Account Portfolio statement for Jeffrey Epstein covering September 1-30, 2002. It details account holdings, trade activity, and transactions, including several large wire transfers to Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co., one of which was for Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Primary holder of the JPMorgan Chase Bank asset account detailed in this portfolio statement.

persons.name: Riley Hornbecker
persons.context: Listed as the account officer service specialist for Jeffrey Epstein's JPMorgan account.

persons.name: Jeanne Brennan
persons.context: Listed as the contact at Financial Trust Company in St. Thomas, VI, for correspondence regarding Jeffrey Epstein's account.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Recipient of a $5,000,000 wire transfer from Jeffrey Epstein's JPMorgan account to Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co., initiated by a client letter.

connections.description: Epstein authorized a $5 million wire transfer from his JPMorgan account to an account for Ghislaine Maxwell at Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co.
Hornbecker is listed as the Account Officer Service Specialist for Epstein's JPMorgan Private Bank account.
Brennan is listed as the contact at Financial Trust Company for correspondence regarding Epstein's account.

events.title: $2M Wire Transfer to Epstein's Palm Beach Account
events.description: A $2,000,000 sale from a money market fund in Epstein's account, followed by a wire transfer to Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co. for Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: $1M Wire Transfer to Epstein's Palm Beach Account
events.description: A $1,000,000 sale from a money market fund in Epstein's account, followed by a wire transfer to Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co. for Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: $5M Wire Transfer to Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A $5,000,000 sale from a money market fund in Epstein's account, followed by a wire transfer to Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co. for Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: New York, NY 10154-1002 (JPMorgan Chase Bank address)
St. Thomas, VI 00802 (Financial Trust Company address for Jeanne Brennan)
Palm Beach, Florida (Implied location of Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co.)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein's JPMorgan asset account held over $21.6 million in cash and short-term investments as of September 30, 2002.
In September 2002, Epstein's account executed three large wire transfers totaling $8 million to Palm Beach National Bank & Trust Co.
A $5 million wire transfer on September 18, 2002, was specifically directed to an account for Ghislaine Maxwell.
The document is marked as 'Confidential Treatment Requested by JPMorgan' and is labeled as 'GOVERNMENT EXHIBIT 504' for case 52 20 Cr. 330 (MN).
